name: Endless Moonlander
description:
My new game, Endless Moonlander!

- Fly the spaceship as high as you can.

- Don't forget to pick up fuel on the landing pads along the way or you will run out! 

- The softer your landing, the more fuel you will be awarded. 

- Avoid the Meteors and Comets as you go.

- If you get high enough you will make it to space and beyond!
